title: अनन्तयात्रा! धर्म का विज्ञान
description: "Anantyatra! Dharm Ka Vigyan" provides scientific vision to spirituality. With the help of works of new age scientists like Einstein (Relativity), Niels Bohr (Complementarity), Heisenberg (Uncertainty), Hawking (Big Bang), Darwin (Evolution), Mendel (Genetics), Kirlian (Kirlian Photography), Dr. Piyush explains the concepts in Indian Spirituality like Maya, Satya, Adwaita, Prana, Chetna, Anhad - nad, Yog, Dhyan, Pranayam etc. A must read to understand the science of Indian Spirituality in entertaining and simplified terms.
author: Piyush Shrivastava
